column3: was a network of tunnels in the northern part of the Shires Eastfarthing
column4: in the hilly region of Scary.  This was one of the more outlying parts of the Shire
column5: which was perhaps the reason that a band of Hobbits rebels led by Fredegar Bolger
column6: hid here for a time when Sharkey took control of the Shire during the War of the Ring.

column1: The name of this place is given as Brockenbores in the text of The Lord of the Rings
column2: but as "Brockenborings" on A Part of the Shire.

column1: David Salo suggests a speculative derivation from Old English *Broccesboran.
